page.description: Gets a list of the users which are members of a role.

argument.name: C
argument.description: Return type, a crlf delimited list of users.

page.discussion: Context.Security.GetRoleUsers() gets a list of the users which are members of a role. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
